structure.unit: SCHOOL EMPLOYEES -- TEACHERS' RETIREMENT AND TENURE

law.catch_line: Employer contributions for members employed by regional educational cooperatives.
law.text: Each regional educational cooperative referred to in KRS 161.220(4)(e) employing members of the Teachers' Retirement System shall have the employer contributions provided in the same manner as for members employed by local boards of education.
law.history: Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 369, sec. 14, effective July 1, 1994.
